item.title: Web Component Icons
item.description: This is the story of <pfe-icon>, an SVG-based icon Web Component I’ve been working on for the PatternFly Elements project. Before the rambling begins, let’s have a demo! .icon-panel { width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr); justify-items: center; } Features On-demand icon loading No CORS restrictions Icon coloring Minimal syntax Icon sets Implementation summary The tag <pfe-icon pfe-icon="rh-server"></pfe-icon> It’s not as concise as I would have liked, but still, not too bad.
